idea-plugin.name: GPT4_lll
idea-plugin.description:
GPT4_lll is a plugin designed for IntelliJ IDEA users, aiming to provide real-time code querying and analysis services using OpenAI's GPT-4 model. This plugin serves as a powerful assistant while you write or read code, helping you better understand and improve your code.

The development of this plugin was a necessary move. The previous plugin I used required entering personal OPENAI_API_KEY, but unfortunately, my account information was misused, and the data was abused, resulting in the suspension of my account.

GPT4_lll plugin is a clean plugin with no potential risks or security issues. We warmly welcome aspiring individuals to join our development team and collaborate on enhancing this plugin.

The core functionalities of this plugin are generated by ChatGpt itself, and I have made only a few modifications to the text. I am grateful for the outstanding work and technical support of artificial intelligence.
